name: Judah Game Jamming's BUV Game Jam 2022 Submission
name_original: Judah Game Jamming's BUV Game Jam 2022 Submission
description:
Judah  Game Jamming's BUV Game Jam 2022 Submission.

Game name: STARSTRUCK

Genre: Top-down Shooter

Game Description:  Shoot stars to create constellations before time runs out in this fast-paced shooter!

Controls: 

  • WASD to move
  • Left Shift to dash
  • Left Click to shoot
